Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2009 09:45PM sarahsewer wrote: Hi Ladies, My chemo ended in December and my hair is now slowly growing in. Slow and patchy and fine. It looks like the fur on the belly of a raccoon. No lie. But at least it is hair and it keeps my head warm. Sarah
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 21, 2009 10:47AM sarahsewer wrote: Hi Ladies, Does anyone else have odd bald patches on their newly haired heads? My hair started to regrow in January and I still have a bald patch the shape of a circus peanut at the base of my skull. Could radiation have shot though it and killed all the hair? I didn't think my head was in the line of fire. Â Thanks for any insight. Sarah
